name: JSON-HC
tagline: A minimal media type: JSON with hypermedia controls
body:
# Introduction

JSON Hypermedia Controls (JSON-HC) is a standard which establishes
conventions for expressing hypermedia controls in JSON [RFC4627].

The Hypermedia Controls of JSON-HC provide a way to figure out which
Actions are possible with a Resource Object, what is the self URL of
the Object and of which profile is the Resource Object.

The official site of json-hc is <https://json-hc.org>.

# Internet Draft

The latest internet draft is published at <https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-schuetze-json-hc>
and is maintained at <https://github.com/json-hc/json-hc-specification/blob/master/json-hc.md> in
markdown.

# Media-Type: `application/vnd.hc+json`

There will be a registered media-type at IANA: `application/vnd.hc+json`

# Compare json-hc to ...

If you want to compare json-hc to [mike kelly's](https://github.com/mikekelly/) awesome [hal](stateless.co/hal_specification.html), I created a document called [json-hc-vs-hal.md](./json-hc-vs-hal.md).

# Example Api

There is also an example api built with json-hc, which describes a game server api at [gameserver-json-example.md](./gameserver-json-example.md).

# About the author

The maintainer and creator of json-hc is [dracoblue](https://dracoblue.net).
